data.name: Innovation Conference
data.description:
Join us for our Innovation Conference! ♻️ GET YOUR TICKETS NOW! 🎟 6 PDR POINTS AVAILABLE! ⭐️ 

With the world at a major turning point in its approach of tackling climate change and pollution, we need a new generation of bright ideas and solutions to solve these problems. 🌍 

Our first conference of the year will focus on sustainability in engineering, and how we are going about tackling the different environmental problems of the world a week after the culmination of COP26. 🗺 

The conference will feature speakers from industries that we have identified are making the biggest steps. 📈 

The conference will consist of talks, a panel discussion, and a networking buffet. 🥳

All engineering students or any student interested in green engineering are welcome! 👥


Confirmed Speakers 🗣 for the event:

Andrew Clifton, Global Sustainability Manager @ Rolls Royce ⚙️ 

Steve Thompson, Environmental Sustainability Manager @ National Grid ⚡️ 

Federico Trotta, CEO @ Metalchemy 💚

Click the ticket link to buy tickets before next Tuesday and get 6 PDR points!! 💫
